entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as speaking in a low, awed voice and whispering back to Hermione. He is watching Moody with fascination.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as whispering questions about what happened to Moody's face.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody is described as being totally indifferent to his less-than-warm welcome and ignoring the jug of pumpkin juice in front of him. He reaches into his traveling cloak and pulls out a hip flask.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is described as clearing his throat and smiling at the students before him.

entities.name: mad-eye moody
entities.description: Mad-Eye Moody is described as being the subject of fascination for Harry and the other students.

relationships.description: Ron is watching Moody with fascination.
Hermione is whispering questions about what happened to Moody's face.
Dumbledore is speaking to the students before him.
Mad-Eye Moody is being observed by Harry and the other students.
